alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 25 at 7:30AM CDT until March 25 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 730 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Samson, or 7 miles west of Geneva, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Geneva around 740 AM CDT. Hartford around 800 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Hendrix Crossroad, Kellys Crossroads, Lytle, Highfalls, Marl, Geneva Municipal A/P and Eunola. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
